def min_sum_subsequence(arr, n):
    if n < 4:
        return min(arr)
    a = arr[0]
    b = arr[1]
    c = arr[2]
    d = arr[3]
    e = arr[4] + min(a, b, c, d)
    for i in range(5, n):
        a = b
        b = c
        c = d
        d = e
        e = arr[i] + min(a, b, c, d)
    a = b
    b = c
    c = d
    d = e
    return min(a, b, c, d)

    b = arr[1]
    c = arr[2]

        b = c
        c = d

    a = b
    b = c

    d = e
